content: What is the meaning of the following proverb: "A friend in need is a friend indeed".

The proverb "A friend in need is a friend indeed" means that a true friend is someone who is there to support and help you when you are in difficult situations or need assistance. It emphasizes the value of having reliable and dependable friends who stand by you during challenging times, distinguishing genuine friendships from those that may be superficial or only present during good times.
